name: CSS
description: CSS is a stylesheet language used for defining the presentation of web pages, including layout, fonts, and colors. It's essential for creating responsive web designs.

name: Javascript
description: JavaScript is a programming language used for adding interactivity and dynamic features to web pages. It's widely used for web development and supported by all modern web browsers.

name: React
description: React JS is a popular JavaScript library for creating dynamic and reusable user interfaces. It uses a programming model based on properties and states to enable efficient updates to the user interface without a complete page reload. It is used by many leading companies and is compatible with many third-party tools.

name: Photoshop
description: Photoshop is a popular image editing software used by professionals and hobbyists alike. It offers powerful tools for creating and manipulating images, and integrates with other Adobe Creative Cloud applications for seamless collaboration.

name: HTML
description: HTML is a markup language used for creating web pages and applications, defining the structure and content of web pages. It's an essential tool for web development.

name: PHP
description: PHP is a popular server-side scripting language for creating dynamic web pages and applications. It's open-source, widely supported, and used by many popular websites.

name: Figma
description: Figma is a cloud-based design and prototyping tool used by teams for real-time collaboration, with a wide range of design features, library assets, and integrations.

name: Illustrator
description: Illustrator is a popular vector graphics software used by professionals for creating precise digital designs, logos, and typography. It integrates with other Adobe Creative Cloud applications for a seamless workflow.
